name: Profile Commands
desc: These commands are for the user profiles.

commands.name: .profile [user]
commands.desc: This command retrieves your or your targetâ€™s Charmy profile from the database and shows it in the chat.

commands.name: .status [text]
commands.desc: This command will set the status on your Charmy profile.

commands.name: .title [text]
commands.desc: this command will set the title on your Charmy profile.

commands.name: .color [rgb/preset-name] [red-value] [green-value] [blue-value]
commands.desc: This command will change your profile colour. You can pick a colour from the following list or set a custom colour by typing 'RGB' and then the values for red, green and blue (these must be numbers ranging from 0 to 255). Existing color presets: coral, navy, pink, lime, turquoise, purple, gold.
